What is the role of full nodes in supporting autochains in Verus, and how are they incentivized to provide this support?

Full nodes in Verus are incentivized to provide reliable static node support for autochains, which allows clients that may not be running full nodes or even own stable IP addresses to create autochains. Once full nodes provide this support, they will be recognized and rewarded for their contributions to the network.
